## Introduction

Are you looking for a simple and lightweight clock widget for your Windows desktop? Look no further than Horloger! This free and open-source software provides an easy and customizable way to display the time and date on your computer screen.

## Features

Horloger offers a variety of features to help you customize your desktop clock widget. Here are just a few of the options available:

- Multiple designs to choose from
- Customizable font types, sizes, and colors
- Adjustable transparency levels
- 12/24-hour time format
- Display of seconds, date, weekday, and time zone

## Installation

To install Horloger, simply download the software from the official website and run the installer. You can choose to install either the 32-bit or 64-bit version of the software, depending on your system requirements.

Once installed, you can access the settings menu by right-clicking the clock widget and selecting the "Settings" option. From here, you can customize the clock design and other settings to your liking.

## Conclusion

If you're in need of a simple and customizable clock widget for your Windows desktop, Horloger is definitely worth checking out. Its lightweight design and variety of features make it a great option for anyone who wants to keep track of the time in style. Give it a try today and see how it can enhance your desktop experience!
